item.title: Egress IPs
item.description: Egress IPsWhen you set up Area 1 using an inline deployment, you need to tell your existing email providers to accept messages coming from Area 1’s egress IP addresses. ​â€‹ United States For customers in the United States, enter the following IP addresses: IPv4: 52.11.209.211 52.89.255.11 52.0.67.109 54.173.50.115 104.30.32.0/191 158.51.64.0/26 158.51.65.0/26 134.195.26.0/24 Office 365 /24 addresses (to be used instead of the /19 subnet): 104.30.32.0/24 104.30.33.0/24 104.30.34.0/24 104.30.35.0/24 104.30.36.0/24 104.
